verification.payload:
tree 3e6445fb5eb62a5f87452116f48dff4fe56f820c
parent 0023b073312354910b48360ad85c6acb20fc85de
author Mark Friedenbach <mark@friedenbach.org> 1500026637 +0900
committer Karl-Johan Alm <karljohan-alm@garage.co.jp> 1500439871 +0900

Add new difficulty adjustment filter, which replaces the simple average over 2016 blocks with a faster-activing 36-tap Parks and McClellan FIR filter, and adjustments every 15 blocks with a gain of 0.125 and a limiter of 1.375.

events.message: Add new difficulty adjustment filter, which replaces the simple average over 2016 blocks with a faster-activing 36-tap Parks and McClellan FIR filter, and adjustments every 15 blocks with a gain of 0.125 and a limiter of 1.375.
